text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Bahraini press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Bahrain plans to develop services which help attract industrial investment in accordance with recommendations raised by Consultative Council members on Tuesday.
- Bahrain Hotels Company posts a 1.4 million dinar net profit in 1996.
- Bahrain is urged to establish a national committee to formulate a long-term industrial strategy on the island.
- Bahrain signs an agreement with the United Nations Environment Programme to establish a station allowing worldwide access to environmental data.
- Around 57,189 people visited Bahrain during Eid al-Adha holiday last week, up 115 percent from last year.
